creator: beau@bestnetpc.com
text:
I am attempting to integrate TagLibs for use with Dreamweaver via the tutorial 
at jakarta.apache.org/taglibs. I am running Win2k with tomcat 4.0.4. I have 
made the necessary installations, but when I try to use a custom tag from 
within Dreamweaver, I run into a problem. The extension is able to successfully 
communicate with Tomcat so that I may 'Select a Custom Tag Library', but I am 
not able to actually 'Select a Tag to Insert'. When I attempt this, I receive 
the following alert 'Tag library "struts-logic" not found on server'. I have 
already edited the useTagLibs.js to listen on the proper port, and am able to 
use the Live Data mode successfully in Dreamweaver. I have tested this with 
both Dreamweaver MX and Dreamweaver Ultradev,  and receiving the same error 
message for each. I have searched the mailing archives extensively and have not 
come across this issue. I did manage to contact another fellow that posted a 
thread a while back with the same problem. No one ever contact him about any 
potential solutions, and he is still unable to use the extension due to the 
same error message that i received. I apologize if this error message is due to 
any omsission on my part, but thought that I would post this as I have not 
found any mention of this problem anywhere. Thanks
